price: Bunlar, dünya ve ahirette amelleri boşa çıkanlardır. Bunların bir yardımcısı da yoktur.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
